pages.text: 77|20|naega bicheonhan mullobuteo geudaedeul-eul changjohaji anh-assdeonga
77|21|geu hu naneun geugeos-eul hwaggohan jeongchagjie dueoss-euni
77|22|iljeonghan gigankkajila
77|23|geuleohge naega jojeolhayeoss-euni eolmana hullyunghi jojeolhaneun jainga
77|24|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|25|naega daejileul geuleus-eulo duji anh-assdeonga
77|26|sal-aissneun jadeulgwa jug-eun jadeul-eul wiham-ila
77|27|geuligo naneun geugos(daeji)e uttug sos-eun dandanhan san-eul dueossgo geudaedeul-i dalkomhan mul-eul masidolog hayeossnola
77|28|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|29|“geudaedeul-i bujeonghadeon geos-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
77|30|“se gaeui deong-eolilo doen eodum-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
77|31|(geu eodum-eneun) geuneuldo eobsgo bulgil-eul mag-ajujido anhnola
77|32|sillo geugeos(jiog)eun seongluwado gat-eun bulkkochdeul-eul naebaet-euni
77|33|geugeos(bulkkoch)eun machi hwangsaeg-ui nagtadeulgwa gatdeola
77|34|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|35|i nal-eun geudeul-i mal-eul haji moshaneun nal-imyeo
77|36|geudeul-ege byeonmyeonghal gihoedo heolagdoeji anh-eul geos-ila
77|37|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|38|i nal-eun bunliui nalloseo naega geudaedeulgwa ijeon salamdeul-eul moassnola
77|39|geuleoni geudaedeul-ege gyelyag-i issdamyeon na-ege gyelyag-eul kkumyeo bola
77|40|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|41|sillo (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geuneulgwa umul gyeot-e iss-eul geos-imyeo
77|42|geudeul-i meoggo sip-eohaneun gwaildo iss-eul geos-ila
77|43|“geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, geudaedeul-i haenghadeon geos-e daehan daegala”
77|44|sillo naneun choeseon-eul dahaneun jadeul-eul geuleohge bosanghanola
77|45|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|46|“eolmagan meoggo jeulgila, sillo geudaedeul-eun aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeul-ila”
77|47|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|48|geudeul-ege “heolisug-yeo jeolhasio” laneun mogsoliga deullil ttae geudeul-eun heolisug-yeo jeolhaji anhdeola
77|49|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|50|geuleohdamyeon geudeul-eun geugeos(kkulan) ioee eotteon malsseum-eul midneundan mal-inga
